question: What is the theme of the 2019 World Tuberculosis Day (WTD)?
option3: Wanted: Leaders for a TB-free world
explanation: The World Tuberculosis Day (WTD) is observed every year on 24th March to raise public awareness about the devastating health, social and economic consequences of TB, and to step up efforts to end the global TB epidemic. The date marks the day in 1882 when Dr Robert Koch announced that he had discovered the bacterium that causes TB, which opened the way towards diagnosing and curing this disease. The 2019 theme \"It\'s time\" pressurizes world leaders to act on their commitments.
